name: Ignis Universia: Awakening of the Erudite Empress demo
name_original: Ignis Universia: Awakening of the Erudite Empress demo
description:
This is a demo for Ignis Universia: Awakening of the Erudite Empress and it is developed for the on-going Kickstarter campaign!

It is from the actual game but content like dialogues and also visuals or even some gameplay mechanics might change for the full game release. However demo gives an idea of the structure and genre - those ones won't be changed!

Ignis Universia is a funny and cute JRPG/Visual Novel hybrid about four women destined to save the world. Game parodies and references the genre, as well as other fiction and music with fourth wall breaking humour. It has a tactical battle system that is 100% turn-based.
